# Draft:Poetry Book Awards

----
The Poetry Book Awards is an international poetry book prize, honouring books by self-published writers or independent presses.
The contest runs annually and is based in Wales.
The organiser, Welsh writer and poet Dave Lewis, is the founder and organiser of the International Welsh Poetry Competition. which has been running since 2007.
